title: Announcing DataComp: In search of the next generation of multimodal datasets
A new Paella: Simple & Efficient Text-To-Image generation
metadata: by: Dominic Rampas and Pablo Pernias , 15 Apr, 2023

title: Petition for keeping up the progress tempo on AI research while securing its transparency and safety.
summary: This petition calls for the establishment of an international, publicly funded, open-source supercomputing research facility to democratize access to AI technology and ensure its safety. It proposes the creation of AI Safety research labs to identify and address potential risks, and to make the results of such research transparent and available to the public. It also emphasizes the importance of taking immediate action to secure the technological independence of our society and protect democratic principles. Finally, it encourages people to join the campaign and make their voices heard.
answer: This petition calls for the establishment of an international, publicly funded, open-source supercomputing research facility to democratize access to AI technology and ensure its safety and transparency.
